abstract.t: This document provides implementation guidance, deployment patterns, and integration considerations for the Ephemeral Compute Attestation (ECA) protocol. It explores concrete Instance Factor patterns ranging from hardware-rooted to artifact-based approaches, documents operational experiences from prototype implementations, and describes how ECA integrates with existing identity frameworks such as ACME and SPIFFE/SPIRE. The document includes practical examples, test vectors, and architectural guidance for deploying ECA across diverse compute environments from cloud VMs to bare-metal systems.
